statements: DELETE FROM academic_records WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM academic_records WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND program_name = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM academic_records WHERE diploma_status = false;
DELETE FROM transcripts WHERE student_id = 123456 AND grade = 'A';
DELETE FROM certificates WHERE student_id = (SELECT student_id FROM transcripts WHERE course_name = 'Math' AND grade = 'B') AND certificate_name = 'Achievement';
DELETE FROM transcripts WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM certificates WHERE certificate_name = 'Excellence Certificate');
DELETE FROM Diplomas WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM AcademicTranscripts WHERE transcript LIKE '%Honor%');
DELETE FROM transcripts WHERE student_id = 123 AND semester = 1;
DELETE FROM certificates WHERE student_id = 789 AND certificate_name = 'English Certificate';
DELETE FROM transcripts WHERE student_id = 123 AND semester = 'Fall';
DELETE FROM certificates WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2019-12-31';
